name: MICHIGAN, petitioner, v. Rahim Omarkhan LOCKRIDGE.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
MICHIGAN, petitioner,
v.
Rahim Omarkhan LOCKRIDGE.
attorneys: Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Michigan denied.
casebody.head_matter:
MICHIGAN, petitioner,
v.
Rahim Omarkhan LOCKRIDGE.
No. 15-416.
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 7, 2015.
Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Michigan denied.
